spoilers.text: #ONEPIECE1174 I now understand why so many leakers (including myself) were confused by the title. After reading @TheWillOfMarco 's translation, I'm certain the title is about Luffy and Loki, who are both the highlight of the chapter and make all of Elbaph tremble.

misc.title: So yeah, Luffy and Loki are described as the strongest beings with this title. The whole scenario where the mothers fail, but then Luffy and Loki appear and save them, already suggests that the title
misc.text: So yeah, Luffy and Loki are described as the strongest beings with this title. The whole scenario where the mothers fail, but then Luffy and Loki appear and save them, already suggests that the title is directed at Luffy and Loki, who both display such incredible power that they shake the entire Sun World. Loki and Luffy are the strongest!!
